xmlText.hl2: Eds: Updates Winter Olympics TV schedule
Schedule subject to change and/or blackouts
xmlText.p: ESPN2 — Joseph Diaz, Jr. vs. Victor Terrazas, for Diaz's NABO featherweight title, at Indio, Calif.
CBSSN — Robert Morris at Mount St. Mary's
ESPN — UConn at Cincinnati
ESPN2 — Wisconsin at Northwestern
ESPNU — Winthrop at UNC-Asheville
FS1 — Purdue at Illinois
CBSSN — Houston at Memphis
ESPN — UCLA at Utah
ESPN2 — Gonzaga at San Diego
ESPNU — Belmont at Jacksonville St.
FS1 — Arizona at Oregon St.
ESPNU — BYU at Portland
FS1 — Arizona St. at Oregon
GOLF — European PGA Tour, Commercial Bank Qatar Masters, first round, at Doha, Qatar (same-day tape)
GOLF — PGA Tour, Honda Classic, first round, at Palm Beach Gardens, Fla.
GOLF — LPGA Tour, Honda LPGA Thailand, second round, at Chonburi, Thailand
TNT — Washington at Cleveland
TNT — L.A. Clippers at Golden State
FS2 — UEFA Europa League, Round of 32, 2nd leg, FC Lokomotiv Moscow vs. OGC Nice
FS1 — UEFA Europa League, Round of 32, 2nd leg, Atletico Madrid vs. Copenhagen
FS2 — UEFA Europa League, Round of 32, 2nd leg, RB Leipzig vs. Napoli
FS1 — UEFA Europa League, Round of 32, 2nd leg, Arsenal vs. Osterland
FS2 — UEFA Europa League, Round of 32, 2nd leg, Atalanta vs. Borussia Dortmund
NBCSN — Curling: Men's semifinal, United States vs. Canada (LIVE)
NBCSN — Short Track Speed Skating: Men's 500m Gold Medal Final, Women's 1000m Gold Medal Final and Men's 5000m Relay Gold Medal Final; Biathlon: Women's 4x6km Relay Gold Medal Final
NBCSN — Curling: Men's semifinal, Sweden vs. Great Britian or Switzerland
NBC — Biathlon: Women's 4x6km Relay Gold Medal Final; Nordic Combined: Team Gold Medal Final
NBCSN — Hockey Game of the Day: Women's Gold Medal Game, United States vs. Canada (replay)
CNBC — Curling: Men's semifinal, United States vs. Canada
NBCSN — Olympic Ice; Figure Skating: Ladies' Free Program (LIVE)
NBC — Figure Skating: Ladies' Gold Medal Final (LIVE); Short Track Speed Skating: Gold Medal Finals in Men's 500mWomen's 1000m and Men's 5000m Relay
NBCSN — Biathlon: Women's 4x6km Relay; Nordic Combined: Men's Team Large Hill/4x5km
NBC — Freestyle Skiing: Women's Ski Cross Gold Medal Final
BTN — Maryland at Michigan
SEC — LSU at South Carolina
BTN — Penn St. at Nebraska
SEC — Kentucky at Mississippi
